title: News24.com | 'We are ready for the next mission', Wuhan repatriation crew tells Ramaphosa
description: President Cyril Ramaphosa has finally given 112 South Africans, who were quarantined at The Ranch Resort after their repatriation from China's coronavirus epicentre, the go-ahead to head home.
content: It was a joyous and emotional Sunday morning at The Ranch Resort in Limpopo, where President Cyril Ramaphosa finally gave 112 South Africans, who were quarantined at the facility after their repatriation from China's coronavirus epicentre, the go-ahead to hea… [+2694 chars]
